oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See =kagara and !haunu, who fought each other with lightning. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-30 8637-8648). |han=kass'o's grandmothers used to tell him that =kagara was fighting with !haunu in the east when the weather thundered and when the clouds resembled mountains and were thick. 1) See also =kagara and !haunu, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-30.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: =kagara's fight with !haunu in the east
